doc:
Henry Brown (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Brown_(actor) 0 Henry Brown is a film, television and stage actor whose career began in the early 1970s and continues to the present. With over sixty credits, he has appeared in over thirty films and thirty television shows. He quite often plays policemen and law enforcement officials. He played the main role in Carmen Madden's 2010 film, Everyday Black Man Henry_Brown is a_film_,_television_and_stage_actor whose_career began in the_early_1970s and continues to the_present . With over_sixty_credits , he has_appeared in over_thirty_films and thirty_television_shows . He quite often plays policemen and law_enforcement_officials .
